website_summaries.verdict: While it's definitely not a pro ball, this one comes from a real sports manufacturing company, and the quality is apparent.
pros: Ball lights up when you start playing, turns off when inactive for 30 seconds
Lights should last for at least 30 hours of active play
Lights activate with passes and drop kicks
Can replace the battery when it runs out
cons: May have an unpleasant rubbery odor when you first unpack it

customer_reviews.title: Arrived flat
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Arrived too flat to give a child.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.RuffinMuffin

customer_reviews.title: Good toy, but no ool
customer_reviews.text: The Baden Elektro Light Up LED Soccer Ball works as advertised, but there is no tool included as stated on the attached paper. The company did not send the tool required. along with the ball.
customer_reviews.author: e kuliesis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for neighborhoods with kids who play soccer at dusk
customer_reviews.text: We are the favorite backyard to play in. The light up ball is the cherry on top.
customer_reviews.author: A Sherm

customer_reviews.title: Rugged ball for multi-surface night time play.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a competition-quality soccer ball, this is not the ball for you. However, if you're looking for a rugged ball that provide fun night-time play on a variety of surfaces (including asphalt and concrete), this is exactly what you want. The ball is sturdy and doesn't scuff or scratch easily. It lights up and provides enough illumination for kicking the ball around in the dark. It inflates round and retains it shape even after hard play. The lights have taken a beating and are still going strong. It adds a fun new option for soccer and it's a hit with kids that might be a little hard to entice to play.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: A fun toy, missing tool, cheaper options exist
customer_reviews.text: It's just okay. The surface is far too rubbery and creates too much friction to be used as a real soccer ball. It is basically a fun toy and my kids enjoy playing with it in the dark; good indoors or outside. I question the why they didn't go with white/red to make it easier to see. Mine also arrived without the required key to replace batteries. Not sure what to do when then die. BTW a quick search for "LED soccer ball" will show you cheaper options available that appear to be the exact same ball under different branding.
customer_reviews.author: AreYouKidding?

customer_reviews.title: Clever, especially for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: This ball is fun out of the chute and the light held up for a while and finally stopped working, but as a novelty early on this, was a fun thing on the field for our men’s league. I play goalkeeper and I could notice a slightly difference in the weight, but it didn’t come up with the field players and the referee didn’t disqualify it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Newby

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got this so granddad could kick it around with his granddaughter who is 3. The ball unpacked ready for to use. We both have lots of fun at dusk kicking it back and forth and watching Electro lights blink. We do not kick it hard so I cannot comment on its durability if used in a serious game. For backyard fun with a young aspiring soccer player it is great and the my granddaughter’s laughter rings in my ears for days. For both my granddaughter and myself, chasing the blinking lights after dark is a lot of fun. I rate the Electro Soccer Ball high.
customer_reviews.author: Music Maker

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but not for real soccer practice
customer_reviews.text: This ball is fun. It's a regular sized soccer ball that lights up to a bright orange. But it's for play and not a "real" soccer ball because it has some differences that are important. The outside material is the wrong texture and the weight is wrong. My daughter, who plays team soccer, said she couldn't practice for real with it, but she does enjoy kicking it around the house and yard. She noticed it has a bit of a "squeak" when she kicks it, and this annoys her.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for Soccer Fans of Any Age
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son loves this soccer ball (and so do his pre-k sisters much to his dismay). Unlike many LED soccer balls, this one does really light up every time it's kicked or hit. The lights don't really show up that well during the day but at night the lights are very bright. It comes with a key to lock and unlock the ball. The ball is regulation size and you can tell when holding it that it's definitely not a cheap quality ball. Definitely recommend for soccer fans of any age.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, works great
customer_reviews.text: Great for late evening play. A good solid bounce or kick is what it takes to turn on the light in this illuminated soccer ball. If it isn't jostled or moved for 30 seconds, it automatically turns off. The glow is evenly distributed. The electronics don't throw the ball out of balance---there's no noticeable wobble when it rolls. A tool is provided for popping up the rubber caps for battery replacement. Lots of fun and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Once in a while

customer_reviews.title: SO COOL
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool!!! I thought it just had a couple of LEDs placed around the ball, but it lights up the whole thing! It's amazing. The only problem is that if you kick it off somewhere, the ball will turn off after 30 seconds and you might not be able to see it. So you'll have to pull out the flashlight or wait til the next day to find it. Otherwise, AWESOME. I can't believe how well it lights up!
customer_reviews.author: wild animals

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: When my husband brought this into my office, he asked me what was so special about it. I told him to bounce it and he did and jumped back, laughing. Wow, it is bright. He better not miss kicking this ball. She should not either. I like how bright and orange this is. It is great that it also turns off on its own. This ended up in the trampoline and it is hard to judge how long the batteries last because it turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Trouble

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet great idea!  Orange spots light up red! Basic recreational ball that adds fun and excitement, especially at nighttime
customer_reviews.text: Simple yet neat idea! The orange areas of the soccer ball light up red when the ball is in play. This will make playing at night time fun and easier than "glow in the dark" balls that lose its light over time. The ball is basic quality, not for game use, but recreational use. My 2 year old daughters love rolling it around, bouncing it and the lights make them even more interested in it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ball
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun ball. It lights up and looks great. Even in the house you can see the lit portion very clearly. The kids just love it. It would be a lot of fun to play outside in the dark. I was pleased with the quality of the ball. It held up to my kids' rough handling without a problem. It seemed very durable. It is just as described. A soccer fan would love this as a gift. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: B. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Very fun in the evenings.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this soccer ball. He even uses it as a basketball. The lights are fun and last a long time. We enjoy using this in the evening. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Dusk to night, Play Ball
customer_reviews.text: The family is enjoying this ball, especially in the evening because of the light up feature.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

product_meta.title: Baden Elektro Light Up LED Soccer Ball
product_meta.description: Blaze a path up the soccer field and watch the Red LED trail of light from your very own Baden Electro Glow in the Dark Soccer Ball fly of your foot and into the goal with ease. The Electro Soccer Ball easily activates with a simple drop, smack or kick of the soccer ball and automatically shuts off after (30) seconds of non-use to maximize battery life. This soccer ball ships fully inflated and includes (6) long lasting (L1154F, 1.5V) Alkaline batteries which are pre-installed for your convenience. The soccer also comes with the tools and the instructions needed to easily replace the batteries after more than (30) hours of light activated use. With Baden Sports being a staple in the inflatable ball business for nearly (30) years you will have the comfort of knowing you will receive the highest quality durable LED rubber soccer ball on the market. We have truly designed this ball to Light-years ahead of our competition and we know you will be beaming once see the difference for yourself. Attribute value truncated
feature_bullets: LIGHTS UP - Electrify the night sky with the Baden Sports Electro LED Light Up Soccer Ball
AUTOMATIC ON/OFF – Forget switches. Once you start playing, the ball lights up. Put it away and 30 seconds later it turns off
EXTENDED PLAY – Keep playing all night, every night, with more than 30 hours of active play utilizing energy efficient LED lights
DURABLE – The ball is designed with Baden’s water-resistant deluxe rubber cover and raised seams that ensures longevity and playability
ALL AGES - Great for parties, birthdays, and as a gift for all ages
